name: Defender of the Road
description:
A Tower Defense x Racing game. Made for LD41.

Tips:

  * Don't let the monster reach the end of the road or you will lose health!
  * Press T to build a defense turret.
  * Press U to upgrade the nearest turret. Upgrading a turret makes it faster and reach a larger distance.
  * Press Space to use your car's canon.
  * The monsters will appear faster over time.
